scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name my-sandbox -e flextesa_node_cors_origin='*' -e block_time=1 --detach -p 8732:20000 tqtezos/flextesa:20210602 granabox start
scripts.compile: yarn clean && ts-node scripts/cli.js compile -f json --c q_farm t_farm burner proxy_minter baker_registry
scripts.migrate-granadanet: yarn compile && ts-node scripts/cli.js migrate -n granadanet
scripts.test:compile-fa12: ts-node scripts/cli.js compile -f json -p contracts/test/main -v 0.9.0 -o test/build --c fa12
scripts.test:compile-fa2: ts-node scripts/cli.js compile -f json -p contracts/test/main -v 0.17.0 -o test/build --c fa2
scripts.test:compile: yarn test:clean && yarn test:compile-fa12 && yarn test:compile-fa2
